08:01 <crocket> How does XWiki initialize $msg when there is no documentBundles?  
08:01 <crocket> I want to know where $msg.get("xe.home.title") comes from.  
08:23 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:36 <vmassol> has quit  
08:47 <crocket> ok  
08:47 <crocket> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/InternationalizingApplications answers my question.

10:50 <vmassol> cjd: good morning, fyi RegisterFromAdministrationTest fails after some time because some tests create users and the livetable doesn't show JohnSmith anymore in its first page… the solution is to filter the livetable  
10:53 <vmassol> note that I've started coding it but the users LT is not a standard LT and my change currently fails:  
10:53 <vmassol> https://raw.github.com/gist/4054331/07c7841f6746adfcbcdf37973ba331c0f53023fc/gistfile1.txt
